thread.title: Lamar Odom taken from Las Vegas hospital to Los Angeles
thread.title_full: Lamar Odom taken from Las Vegas hospital to Los Angeles

author: SALLY HO and CHRISTOPHER WEBER
title: Lamar Odom taken from Las Vegas hospital to Los Angeles
text:
Ross D. Franklin Lamar Odom taken from Las Vegas hospital to Los Angeles 
FILE - In this April 24, 2007, file photo, Los Angeles Lakers' Lamar Odom sits on the bench during a Western Conference playoff basketball game against the Phoenix Suns in Phoenix. Odom left a Las Vegas hospital and is now in the Los Angeles area to continue his recovery a week after being found unconscious at a Nevada brothel, a family representative said Tuesday, Oct. 20, 2015. (AP Photo/Ross D. Franklin, File) Evan Agostini Lamar Odom taken from Las Vegas hospital to Los Angeles 
FILE - In this April 30, 2012, file photo, Khloe Kardashian Odom and Lamar Odom from the show "Keeping Up With The Kardashians" attend an E! Network upfront event at Gotham Hall in New York. A family representative says Lamar Odom has left a Las Vegas hospital and is now in the Los Angeles area to continue his recovery a week after being found unconscious at a Nevada brothel. Alvina Alston, publicist for Odom's aunt JaNean Mercer, said Tuesday, oct. 20, 2015, that the former NBA star was transported by helicopter from Sunrise Hospital and Medical Center in Las Vegas around 5 p.m. Monday. (AP Photo/Evan Agostini, File) Posted: Tuesday, October 20, 2015 2:53 pm | Updated: 3:15 pm, Tue Oct 20, 2015. Lamar Odom taken from Las Vegas hospital to Los Angeles Associated Press | 
LOS ANGELES (AP) — Lamar Odom left a Las Vegas hospital and is now in the Los Angeles area to continue his recovery a week after he was found unconscious at a Nevada brothel, a family representative said Tuesday. 
The former NBA star was transported by helicopter from Sunrise Hospital and Medical Center in Las Vegas around 5 p.m. Monday, according to a statement from Alvina Alston, publicist for Odom's aunt JaNean Mercer. She did not say where he was taken in Los Angeles. Subscription Required An online service is needed to view this article in its entirety.
